about.title: About
about.welcome: Welcome to leelicspace - my digital corner on the internet.
about.intro1: I'm a developer passionate about AI, web technologies, and building useful tools. This space is where I share my thoughts, projects, and learning journey.
about.intro2: The name 'leelicspace' comes from combining my name 'Lee' with 'elics' (my name spelled backwards) and 'space', representing my digital corner on the internet.

projects.AlignJuice: High-quality alignment data management framework - transforming coarse-filtered data into high-quality LLM alignment data
projects.speaksense: AI-powered speech analysis tool to improve presentation skills
projects.Eval-Explorer-: Building 'knowledge infrastructure' for LLM evaluation field, solving researchers' core pain points of not knowing what standards to use, where to find datasets, and how to compare horizontally
